comments.body:
This will not work because when given `prompt(questions)`, the compiler won't known which signature you are targeting, so it will **always pick the first one**, which is the 

```
prompt(questions: Questions, cb?: (answers: Answers) => any): ui.Prompt;
```

so the return type will always be `ui.Prompt`.

You can change the `cb` parameter to non-optional to make it work.
